Task

Source: R/deploy.R
Task.Rd

Task

Task

Details

An R6 class that represents a Task

See also

Other R6 classes: Bundle, Content, ContentTask, Environment, PositConnect, Vanity, Variant, VariantSchedule, VariantTask

Public fields

connect

The Connect instance.

task

The task.

data

The task data.

Method clone()
